[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Workplace restoration services help public and private sector leaders promote respectful workplace relationships and improve performance.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1495831604442{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]ADR Chambers’ workplace restoration services include:

  • Workplace reviews and environmental scans
  • Conflict resolution
  • Team-building
  • Coaching
  • Change management strategies 

Workplace Reviews, Environmental Scans

Our consultants gather data about the work environment and identify workplace challenges through individual interviews, customized questionnaires, and focus groups. Our consultants then share their analysis, observations and recommendations.

The consultants then help clients develop a customized workplace restoration process. The process may include team-building activities, facilitated group sessions, mediation, conflict resolution or effective communication skills training and coaching.

Our workplace restoration consultants are experienced with change management approaches, workplace diagnosis and assessment, and adult learning principles.

For more information, please contact us.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Request More Information About Workplace Restoration” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-info-circle” css_animation=”none” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_custom_heading text=”Other ADR Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”66″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
